member.summary: Mandatory Engine token. Will be included in the connection string even when empty.

member.summary: A Uri token. Will be included in the connection string even when empty.

member.summary: A security token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.summary: Determines if the default credentials will be send with the request

member.summary: A username token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Password
member.summary: A password token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Timeout
member.summary: A timeout token determining The timeout for rendering a document measured in seconds. The default value is 100 seconds. if set to 0, the connection timeout will never expire.

member.summary: Stores the queued tasks to be executed by our pool of STA threads.

member.summary: The STA threads used by the scheduler.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StaTaskScheduler class with the specified concurrency level.
member.param: The number of threads that should be created and used by this scheduler.

member.summary: Queues a Task to be executed by this scheduler.
member.param: The task to be executed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.GetScheduledTasks
member.summary: Provides a list of the scheduled tasks for the debugger to consume.
member.returns: An enumerable of all tasks currently scheduled.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a Task may be inlined.
member.param: The task to be executed.
Whether the task was previously queued.
member.returns: true if the task was successfully inlined; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.Dispose
member.summary: Cleans up the scheduler by indicating that no more tasks will be queued. This method blocks until all threads successfully shutdown.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.MaximumConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum concurrency level supported by this scheduler.
